show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
It’s Here! It’s A Day Early! It’s ‘Free Your Mind … Thursday(? <!--more--> ’ Don’t panic, “Free Your Mind Friday” is still in full effect.
We’re just making a switch to accommodate tomorrow’s guest’s crammed academic schedule (you won’t want to miss that program).
The benefit, of course, is that you get to sound off a whole day sooner!
The world’s greatest forum for the exchange of opinions and ideas is open to you.
Share your thoughts and unique perspectives on critical issues of the day, or take us on an unscripted tour of other realities we’re reluctant, or too timid, to confront.
Bring your intellectual best to the gathering place.
Call 888-874-4888 and trade some quality merchandise.
